summary: Create a web scraper to extract email contact information from websites

features.title: Extract Email Contact Information
features.description: Use Puppeteer and Handlebars to scrape email contact information from popular websites

features.title: Handle Special Characters and Spelling Mistakes
features.description: Use regular expressions and escape characters to handle special characters and spelling mistakes in email addresses

features.title: Improve User Experience with Error Handling
features.description: Implement error handling mechanisms to improve user experience and prevent common errors such as invalid data formats
